sentences.en: a tireless campaigner for human rights
sentences.cn: 不屈不挠的人权运动参与者

sentences.en: Agents and publishers are tireless in their search for unknown talent.
sentences.cn: 文学经济人和出版商无时不在发掘有才无名的作家.

sentences.en: He is a tireless fighter against racism.
sentences.cn: 他是一位不屈不挠的反种族歧视的斗士.
他是个工作起来孜孜不倦的人.

sentences.en: He was a tireless worker for justice.
sentences.cn: 他是个为了正义不知疲倦地工作的人。

sentences.en: He was above all a good and tireless writer.
sentences.cn: 他首先是一位优秀的、不知疲倦的作家.

sentences.en: He was quite tireless, bubbling over with vitality.
sentences.cn: 他毫无倦意，兴致勃勃地说个没完。

sentences.en: It is tireless, this wind, and that is its mistake.
sentences.cn: 风, 无止无休地刮,似乎永远不知疲倦, 然而这正是它失策的地方.

sentences.en: My tireless little cilia make about ten sweeping strokes a second.
sentences.cn: 我那不怕疲劳的小纤毛每秒钟约做10次清扫动作.

sentences.en: Our attitude towards ourselves should be " to be insatiable in learning " and towards others " to be tireless in teaching ".
sentences.cn: 对自己, “ 学而不厌 ” ,对人家, “ 诲人不倦 ”,我们应取这种态度.

sentences.en: The people saluted him for his tireless efforts for peace.
sentences.cn: 人们对他为和平所做的不懈努力表示敬意.

sentences.en: the tireless efforts of the rescue workers
sentences.cn: 营救人员坚持不懈的努力

sentences.en: The wailing tireless voice of the living singer shifted backwards.
sentences.cn: 那个还活在人世里的歌手那悲咽的,一刻也不停息的声音向脑后的方向飘去了.

sentences.en: Their toils and tireless courage were our salvation.
sentences.cn: 他们艰苦的工作和不倦的勇气拯救了我们.

sentences.en: They are tireless in thinking up initiatives.
sentences.cn: 他们不厌其烦地想出种种采取主动行为的倡议.

sentences.en: We salute you for your tireless efforts for peace.
sentences.cn: 我们为您在寻求和平方面做出的不懈努力向您表示敬意.

words.tran_cn: 累人的；麻烦的；无聊的；引起疲劳的
不知疲倦地；不屈不挠地
疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
厌倦；使劳累（tire的ing形式）；感到疲倦

trans.tran_en: working very hard in a determined way without stopping
